name: appcom-conventions-ios
description: This document describes the style guide applied to iOS projects for appcom interactive GmbH. It describes rules how to  organize your project, dependencies and files, so that some best practises are held. It is based on the [Appcom General Code Style Guide](http://appcom-bitbucket/projects/APCON/repos/appcom-conventions-general)  which should be known to understand all parts of this guide.
author: appcom interactive GmbH
